name: Rune Breaker
description: Rune Breaker is a medieval adventure game. Use the power of runes to solve puzzles, destroy obstacles, explore the world around you and move towards your objective. Meet epic creatures, get know their stories and dilemmas through texts and poems created exclusively for the game. Rune Breaker presents a complete adventure experience: it's not only the gameplay that matters, but also the characters and stories which exist inside this universe.
